name: snippetnote
description: SnippetNote is a VS Code extension designed to facilitate note-taking and exporting notes while learning project code. Users can select a code snippet, use the GitHub Copilot extension to generate explanations, and then export the code snippet along with the explanation to a Markdown document in the project's root directory. The extension also supports adding and removing entries in an existing Markdown file based on a numbering system.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
